DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine CP-945,598 effective prevention weight regain obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A 14-Month Study On The Effects Of CP-945,598 For The Prevention Of Weight Regain In Obese Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The CP-945,598 program terminate November 3 , 2008 due change regulatory perspective risk/benefit profile CB1 class likely new regulatory requirement approval . No safety issue involve termination decision .
DOC.criteria: Subject must overweight ( BMI ) > /=30 kg/m2 , subject without co morbidity ; > /=27 kg/m2 subject co morbidity Subjects willing able comply 8 week Low Calorie Diet , schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , trial procedure . Participation formal weight loss program significant weight loss ( fluctuation > 5 % total body weight ) past 3 month . Subjects serious medical psychiatric condition
